name: Shiftshroom
description: The Shiftshroom is a medium-sized plant that can change its appearance to instill fear, resembling a poisonous deathcap mushroom when threatening.
memorable: Its ability to frighten nearby creatures can disrupt powerful foes despite its fragility.
goals: To weaken opponents through fear and maintain an element of surprise with its ability to change shape.
relations: May be found in the company of other magical plants or forest creatures.
environment: Typically found in forested or mushroom-rich areas.
strengths: Immunity to being blinded, deafened, or frightened, and tactical versatility in shapechanging.
weaknesses: Low Armor Class and poor Dexterity make it vulnerable in direct combat.
attacks: Uses a Slam attack, dealing modest bludgeoning damage.
most_powerful_ability: Its Shapechanger ability allows it to become a frightening version of itself, inducing fear in creatures nearby.
senses: Possesses blindsight within a 30-foot radius but is completely blind beyond that distance.
additional_information: Low Dexterity leads to ineffective dodging.
Passive perception of 7 limits its awareness of threats.
Any creature starting its turn nearby risks becoming frightened.
Can only perform limited actions when in frightening form.
Reverts to true form upon taking damage or death.
test_queries: slow-moving mushroom monster with dangerous form
deathcap mushroom form that frightens nearby creatures
